items.name: Dog Eared Vows
items.desc:
Dog Eared Vows / DDH Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 5.2% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Sometimes you just can’t help coming back to your favourites. A combo of absolute worldies – Ella, Vic Secret and Citra – generate superfruit particles and juicy reactions throughout this gluggable slice of tropical sunshine.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Fashion Sport
items.desc:
Fashion Sport / DDH Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 5.0% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Dynamic full maximum flavour [Fashion Sport] smart casual pale ale avec Belma Nelson Sauvin hops one-size-fits-all plush waterproof lining for stylish soft fruit next day delivery grape melon lime dry finish for you.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: House IPA
items.desc:
House IPA / India Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 6.9% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
House IPA is a New England IPA with a light and fluffy body, delicate carbonation, and a big-hitting dry-hop combo of Mosaic and Motueka. Aromas of mango and pineapple. More tropical fruit on the tongue. Super drinkable and very moreish.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: PALE PALE PALE 12-PACK
items.desc:
PALE PALE PALE 12 x 440ml Pack
A new pack of pure pale ale perfection for all your hoppy needs. Cases cannot be customised. Beers included:
4 x DOG EARED VOWS – DDH PALE ALE (ELLA VIC SECRET CITRA) – 5.2% ABV *NEW*
Sometimes you just can’t help coming back to your favourites. A combo of absolute worldies – Ella, Vic Secret and Citra – generate superfruit particles and juicy reactions throughout this gluggable slice of tropical sunshine.
4 x LUNCHTIME BOW TIE – PALE ALE (AMARILLO SIMCOE EL DORADO) – 4.5% ABV *NEW*
Amarillo, Simcoe and El Dorado make for a stylish Pale that twinkles in dark or day. Lunchtime Bow Tie is full of grapefruit and mango flavours with a snazzy, lemon zest finish. You can dress fancy anytime, you Bobby Dazzler.
4 x FASHION SPORT – PALE ALE (BELMA NELSON SAUVIN) – 5.0% ABV *NEW*
Dynamic full maximum flavour [Fashion Sport] smart casual pale ale avec Belma Nelson Sauvin hops one-size-fits-all plush waterproof lining for stylish soft fruit next day delivery grape melon lime dry finish for you.

items.name: Rainbow Healing Temple
items.desc:
Rainbow Healing Temple / Export Porter / 4 x 440ml / 6.8% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
RAINBOW HEALING TEMPLE is a new 6.8% Export Porter designed to give you classic, hefty malt flavours balanced by some poppin‘ dry hop.
It’s a stocky, sturdy dark beer full of chocolate, raisin and toasty vibes, while lightly tropical and resinous hop notes give it a firm, fresh finish. Full-bodied flavours matched by massive drinkability. Whammo.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Rooftops
items.desc:
Rooftops / New England TIPA / 1 x 440ml / 9.5% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Rooftops is our first ever canned TIPA, hopped with Chinook, Citra and Sabro! It’s scandalously juicy with ripe mango, pineapple, and zesty lime, while a tickle of coconut gives this beer a silky drinkability for such a giant lad.
One can leaves 23 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Secret Hotel
items.desc:
Secret Hotel / DDH Rye Pale Ale / 4 x 440ml / 5.5% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Secret Hotel is a DDH Rye Pale Ale hopped with Cryo Citra, Enigma and Sabro. Super-pale, hazy and complex, with notes of berries, pineapple and coconut from the hops mingling with a sweet note of spice from the rye malt.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Stereo Belly
items.desc:
Stereo Belly / NEIPA / 4 x 440ml / 7.1% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Citra and Sabro lead this tropical fruit cruise across the planet New England, with the magic fairy dust that it is Zythos giving everything a rose-tinted, peachy vibe. These hops create echoes in stereo.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: THE TANK BAR 12-PACK
items.desc:
THE TANK BAR 12 x 440ml Pack
Lockdown special selection of beers from the Tank Bar fridges! A highly limited, always-evolving selection. Each pack of 12 cans will consist of 9 different beers. Cases cannot be customised. Beers included:
1 x ROOFTOPS – NEW ENGLAND TRIPLE IPA (CHINOOK CITRA SABRO) – 9.5% ABV
Rooftops is scandalously juicy with ripe mango, pineapple, and zesty lime, while a tickle of coconut gives this beer a silky drinkability for such a giant lad.
1x RAINBOW HEALING TEMPLE – EXPORT PORTER – 6.8% ABV
A stocky, sturdy dark beer full of chocolate, raisin and toasty vibes, while lightly tropical and resinous hop notes give it a firm, fresh finish. Full-bodied flavours matched by massive drinkability. Whammo.
2 x LUNCHTIME BOW TIE – PALE ALE (AMARILLO SIMCOE EL DORADO) – 4.5% ABV *NEW*
Amarillo, Simcoe and El Dorado make for a stylish Pale that twinkles in dark or day. Lunchtime Bow Tie is full of grapefruit and mango flavours with a snazzy, lemon zest finish. You can dress fancy anytime, you Bobby Dazzler.
1 x SECRET HOTEL – DDH RYE PALE ALE (CRYO CITRA ENIGMA SABRO) – 5.5% ABV *NEW*
Secret Hotel is a DDH Rye Pale Ale hopped with Cryo Citra, Enigma and Sabro. Super-pale, hazy and complex, with notes of berries, pineapple and coconut from the hops mingling with a sweet, bready note of spice from the rye malt.
1 x FASHION SPORT – PALE ALE (BELMA NELSON SAUVIN) – 5.0% ABV *NEW*
Dynamic full maximum flavour [Fashion Sport] smart casual pale ale avec Belma Nelson Sauvin hops one-size-fits-all plush waterproof lining for stylish soft fruit next day delivery grape melon lime dry finish for you.
1 x WE BUY TEETH – AMERICAN BROWN ALE (CENTENNIAL COLUMBUS) – 5.5% ABV *NEW*
Something solid to cling to in tough times, this American Brown Ale has mature flavours, simple styling and comfort throughout. Caramel and shortbread notes balanced by resinous hops and light, lasting fruitiness. Don’t worry, we won’t tell anyone you secretly love brown ale.
1 x PASSING BY – DDH RED ALE (CITRA CENTENNIAL COLUMBUS) – 5.7% ABV
A DDH Red Ale dry hopped with Citra, Centennial and Columbus. All the juicy hop goodness of an IPA but with a lovely, biscuity, toffee roundness.
2 x TROPICAL DELUXE – PALE ALE (CITRA MOSAIC SIMCOE) – 3.8% ABV
Tropical Deluxe is our core pale ale. Citra, Mosaic and Simcoe do the tropical dry hop tango, while the mighty London Ale III yeast strain keeps things soft, light, and as level as a hammock. Lower in alcohol, deluxer in tropical.
2 x HOUSE IPA – NEIPA (MOSAIC MOTUEKA AMARILLO) – 6.9% ABV
House IPA is a New England IPA with a light and fluffy body, delicate carbonation, and a big-hitting dry-hop combo of Mosaic and Motueka. Aromas of mango and pineapple. More tropical fruit on the palate. Super drinkable and very moreish.

items.name: THIS IS NOT AN ADVENT CALENDAR 24-PACK [inc. FREE DELIVERY]
items.desc:
THIS IS NOT AN ADVENT CALENDAR 24 x 440ml Pack
This is not an advent calendar. Any resemblance to any advent calendar either living or dead is purely coincidental. A highly limited, always-evolving selection. Each pack of 24 cans will consist of 10 different beers. Cases cannot be customised. Beers included:
1 x ROOFTOPS – NEW ENGLAND TRIPLE IPA (CHINOOK CITRA SABRO) – 9.5% ABV
Rooftops is scandalously juicy with ripe mango, pineapple, and zesty lime, while a tickle of coconut gives this beer a silky drinkability for such a giant lad.
3 x DOG EARED VOWS – DDH PALE ALE (ELLA VIC SECRET CITRA) – 5.2% ABV *NEW*
Sometimes you just can’t help coming back to your favourites. A combo of absolute worldies – Ella, Vic Secret and Citra – generate superfruit particles and juicy reactions throughout this gluggable slice of tropical sunshine.
3 x LUNCHTIME BOW TIE – PALE ALE (AMARILLO SIMCOE EL DORADO) – 4.5% ABV *NEW*
Amarillo, Simcoe and El Dorado make for a stylish Pale that twinkles in dark or day. Lunchtime Bow Tie is full of grapefruit and mango flavours with a snazzy, lemon zest finish. You can dress fancy anytime, you Bobby Dazzler.
3 x SECRET HOTEL – DDH RYE PALE ALE (CRYO CITRA ENIGMA SABRO) – 5.5% ABV *NEW*
Secret Hotel is a DDH Rye Pale Ale hopped with Cryo Citra, Enigma and Sabro. Super-pale, hazy and complex, with notes of berries, pineapple and coconut from the hops mingling with a sweet, bready note of spice from the rye malt.
3 x FASHION SPORT – PALE ALE (BELMA NELSON SAUVIN) – 5.0% ABV *NEW*
Dynamic full maximum flavour [Fashion Sport] smart casual pale ale avec Belma Nelson Sauvin hops one-size-fits-all plush waterproof lining for stylish soft fruit next day delivery grape melon lime dry finish for you.
2 x WE BUY TEETH – AMERICAN BROWN ALE (CENTENNIAL COLUMBUS) – 5.5% ABV *NEW*
Something solid to cling to in tough times, this American Brown Ale has mature flavours, simple styling and comfort throughout. Caramel and shortbread notes balanced by resinous hops and light, lasting fruitiness. Don’t worry, we won’t tell anyone you secretly love brown ale.
1 x BASS STRAIT – NEW WORLD HELLES LAGER (MOTUEKA) – 4.7% ABV *NEW*
Bass Strait is a New World Helles Lager, where the addition of Motueka hops from New Zealand add a gentle, floral fruitiness to the classically bready Helles texture and crisp finish.
1 x PASSING BY – DDH RED ALE (CITRA CENTENNIAL COLUMBUS) – 5.7% ABV
A DDH Red Ale dry hopped with Citra, Centennial and Columbus. All the juicy hop goodness of an IPA but with a lovely, biscuity, toffee roundness.
3 x TROPICAL DELUXE – PALE ALE (CITRA MOSAIC SIMCOE) – 3.8% ABV
Tropical Deluxe is our core pale ale. Citra, Mosaic and Simcoe do the tropical dry hop tango, while the mighty London Ale III yeast strain keeps things soft, light, and as level as a hammock. Lower in alcohol, deluxer in tropical.

items.name: Well Shot 2019
items.desc:
Well Shot 2019 / Bourbon Barrel Aged Imperial Stout / 1 x 750ml / 13% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
The base beer for Well Shot was our ‘Fighting Ale’ Imperial Stout, aged in Buffalo Trace Bourbon barrels for 12 months and released in November 2019. It has now been aged in bottle for over a year.
Well Shot has massive aromatics of vanilla and caramel from the barrel, with intense chocolate, treacle and dried fruit flavours. A year’s maturity in bottle has rounded out the boozier notes with richer flavours of coffee, raisin and toffee, making for a wonderfully festive and well-balanced Imperial Stout, pre-aged for your convenience.
Each bottle is shipped in its own air-cushioned shipping box. Any other beers you order will be packed and shipped separately!
